func:
if (msg.payload.length !== 1) {
    return { ...msg, statusCode: 404 };
}

const {
    id,
    name,
    type,
    sensor_set,
    read_acceleration,
    read_compass,
    read_distance,
    read_location,
    read_speed,
    read_temperature,
    read_volume,
    read_zone,
} = msg.payload[0]

const device = {
    id,
    name,
    sensor_set,
    type_id: type,
    config: {
        accelerometer: !!read_acceleration,
        compass: !!read_compass,
        distance: !!read_distance,
        location: !!read_location,
        speed: !!read_speed,
        temperature: !!read_temperature,
        volume: !!read_volume,
        zone: !!read_zone,
    },
}

return { ...msg, payload: device };

func:
const { payload: { all: readings, distance: distances } } = msg;

console.log(readings, distances)

const canonOne = ({
    id,
    device_id,
    heartbeat,
    reported_at,
    
    accel_x,
    accel_y,
    accel_z,
    heading,
    zone,
    latitude: lat,
    longitude: lng,
    speed,
    temp_degrees: tmp,
    volume_db: vol,
}) => {
    const ds = distances
        .filter((d) => d.id === id)
        .map(({distance_from, distance}) => ({distance_from, distance}));

    return {
        id,
        device_id,
        heartbeat,
        reported_at,
        acceleration: accel_x === null
            ? undefined
            : { x: accel_x, y: accel_y, z: accel_z },
        distances: ds.length ? ds : undefined,
        heading: heading === null
            ? undefined
            : heading,
        location: (lat === null && lng === null && zone === null)
            ? undefined
            : {
                latitude: lat === null ? undefined : lat,
                longitude: lng === null ? undefined : lng,
                zone: zone === null ? undefined : zone,
            },
        speed: speed === null
            ? undefined
            : speed,
        temperature: tmp === null ? undefined : tmp,
        volume: vol === null ? undefined : vol,
    };
}

return { ...msg, payload: readings.map(canonOne) };
